data.title: State
data.meta_description: Visit our website to learn more about Arkansas State University and how we can help you achieve your dreams. You can find information about admissions, our history, community, and our student population.
data.text:
As soon as you set foot on our campus you will know you’ve found the place you can call home.

Our students are engaged in a wide range of academic pursuits that include degree programs in 160 undergraduate and graduate fields delivered by 6 different colleges.

Visit the Office of Academic Affairs & Research >>

Welcome to Arkansas State

Find Your Place in the Pack

Finding your place is more than just a location; it’s about discovering your purpose, exploring your passions, on a campus that feels like home. At Arkansas State, you can achieve at the highest levels, chase your dreams, while forming lasting relationships.

A-State Promise Plus

Free Tuition for Many Arkansans

With the median household income in Arkansas at $53,000, this new scholarship open doors to families who originally believed attending a Carnegie Research 2 university was out of reach. The “Plus” is a housing scholarship to assist campus residents.

Experience A-State

Schedule a Campus Visit

People can tell you how great a place is, they can show you pictures and use every descriptive word in the book, but the best way to know whether it’s right for you is to see it – and experience it – for yourself!
